text: Today on the West Coast, Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are offering fun 2 ft @ 9s W with fresh 17 mph E winds. Best windows are mid-morning to early afternoon. Tomorrow drops to 1 ft @ 9s WNW across the board, so itâ€™s a give-it-a-miss day. Day after, expect 6 ft @ 7s NW but fresh 28 mph NNW winds will make it blown out. Best: today.
